title: Chinese Prawns and Sprouted Beans
ingredients: ['200g egg noodles', '2 tsp toasted sesame oil', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', 'small bunch of spring onions, chopped', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '1 large fresh green chilli, halved, seeded and thinly sliced', '250g pack stir-fry vegetables', '300ml chicken or vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '150g button mushrooms, sliced', '150g fresh lentil or mung bean sprouts, or other sprouted beans', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '300g cooked, peeled prawns', '3 eggs, beaten']
